name: FlashBack Screen Recorder Movie
summary: Learn about .FBZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: FBZ files are similar to .FBR files, but are created with TestAssistant 1.4.5 and earlier. They include PC information, which is a user-selectable option. TestAssistant 1.5 and later saves all files with an ".fbr" extension.
Like FBR files, FBZ files can be played with BB FlashBack Free Player

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
